statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' AND claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 100;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_number = 500;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8;
SELECT claim_id, fraud_score, detection_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE claim_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_number
SELECT claim_id, detection_id, fraud_score FROM insurance_claims JOIN fraud_detection ON insurance_claims.claim_id = fraud_detection.claim_id
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims
SELECT claim_amount, fraud_score FROM insurance_claims, fraud_detection WHERE insurance_claims.claim_id = fraud_detection.claim_id ORDER BY fraud_score DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_age, claimant_address FROM claimants;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_notes FROM investigations WHERE fraud_detection_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT claimants.claimant_name, insurance_claims.claim_date FROM claimants INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON claimants.claimant_id = insurance_claims.claim_id WHERE claimants.claimant_age < 30;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount, AVG(claimant_age) AS average_claimant_age FROM insurance_claims JOIN claimants ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claimants.claimant_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' OR claim_status = 'Rejected';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, status FROM claim WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_date, claim_description FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_history ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_start_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount, status FROM claim WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_address FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_id = 1;
SELECT investigator_id, investigator_name, investigator_department FROM claim_investigators;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Medical' AND fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_address FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_type FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT investigator_name, investigator_department FROM claim_investigators WHERE investigator_department LIKE '%Fraud%';
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_amount, c.claim_type, d.document_type FROM insurance_claims c INNER JOIN claim_documents d ON c.claim_id = d.claim_id;
